item.description:
I can't believe it, its already upon us - Ken is leaving town for Boston and this is his last weekend in Providence!

So come out to Abe's for a low-key celebration and cheerio this Saturday night - Ken, we'll miss you!!!!!

Abe's is a cozy bar located near the Wickenden Pub and Duck and Bunny. If you're looking for food, they allow deliveries from anywhere or you can bring in from any of the local restaurants and there is a discount if you order from United BBQ. Either way, its always a good time!

Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a silver scarf -but we're hard to miss!
item.why: Ken is moving to Boston - and who knows if we'll ever see him again? Just kidding, but this IS Rhode Island after all and WE dont' travel.......well some of us don't. ;-)
item.name: Come out and say goodbye to Ken!
